posts.post_content: [Phyrexian Metamorph](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Metamorph) is the only thing in Standard that can copy it. There are other cards that create token copies of cards as they are cast, but you can only cast this as Chalice of Life, and you can't flip a token. :(

Posted By: JaFaR_Ironclad (2/28/2012 5:46:11 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I don't understand the flavor at all. What is it trying to convey? That if you drink from it enough and become invigorated enough, you'll be able to make other people die with it?   
  
...Anyways, it's an interesting card, I haven't seen another quite like it. I have 3 of them now, one Foil. It makes me want to try something other than Standard so that I can try this strange thing out. Seems like a great finisher for lifegain decks. Get your life up, and then end it. Rather than just riding out your 800,000 lifepoints slowly and using "plenty of time" as your wincon.
posts.html:
